parameter.label: Email Addresses To Email
parameter.tooltip: List of comma delimited email addresses to email

parameter.label: Login IDs To Email
parameter.tooltip: List of comma delimited login ids to email (email addresses looked up in CTM:People)

parameter.label: JSON Misc.
parameter.tooltip: JSON input of miscellaneous values

parameter.label: Request Instance ID
parameter.tooltip: instanceId of the Kinetic Request submission to get answers/dataset for

parameter.label: Region
parameter.tooltip: Region to send the message to/for, recommended if using predefined recipients

parameter.label: Language
parameter.tooltip: Language to send the message in, recommended if using predefined recipients

parameter.label: Data Source:
parameter.tooltip: The source that contains the data to use to create each task in the loop.

parameter.label: Loop Path:
parameter.tooltip: The XPath statement to indicate what data records to process.

parameter.label: Variable Name:
parameter.tooltip: The local variable name used to represent the data used in loop tasks.

parameter.label: Type:
parameter.tooltip: How many loop processes must be completed before continuing?

parameter.label: Number:
parameter.tooltip: If some, how many?

parameter.label: JSON String
parameter.tooltip: The json string to be converted.

parameters.parameter:
<%= if @inputs.has_key?('JSON Misc.') && !@inputs['JSON
                  Misc.'].nil? && @inputs['JSON Misc.'].length > 0 then
                  @inputs['JSON Misc.'] else '{}' end %>

parameter.label: Data Source:
parameter.tooltip: The source that contains the data to use to create each task in the loop.

parameter.label: Loop Path:
parameter.tooltip: The XPath statement to indicate what data records to process.

parameter.label: Variable Name:
parameter.tooltip: The local variable name used to represent the data used in loop tasks.

parameter.label: Type:
parameter.tooltip: How many loop processes must be completed before continuing?

parameter.label: Number:
parameter.tooltip: If some, how many?

parameter.label: Remedy Login ID:
parameter.tooltip: The Remedy Login ID associated to the CTM People record to retrieve

parameter.label: Submission ID
parameter.tooltip: Enter the Customer Survey ID or instanceId of the KS_SRV_CustomerSurvey_base form

parameter.label: Submission ID
parameter.tooltip: Submission Instance ID

parameter.label: Submission ID
parameter.tooltip: CustomerSurveyInstanceId or CustomerSurveyID on KS_CustomerSurvey

parameter.label: From (email address)
parameter.tooltip: The email address of the simulated sender.

parameter.label: To (email address)
parameter.tooltip: The email address of the intended recipient.

parameter.label: Subject
parameter.tooltip: The subject of the email.

parameters.parameter:
<%= content="" content=@results['Get Notification Content -
                  Email']['Subject'].gsub(/<DATASET>(.*?)<\/DATASET>/) do
                  @results['Dataset'][$1] end
                  content=content.gsub(/<ATTACHMENT>(.*?)<\/ATTACHMENT>/) do
                  "" end content=content.gsub(/<ANSWER>(.*?)<\/ANSWER>/) do
                  @results['Answers'][$1] end
                  content=content.gsub(/<BASE>(.*?)<\/BASE>/) do
                  @results['Base'][$1] end
                  content=content.gsub(/<MISC>(.*?)<\/MISC>/) do
                  @results['Misc. Inputs'][$1] end content %>

parameter.label: HTML Body
parameter.tooltip: HTML representing the body of a rich email.

parameters.parameter:
<%= content="" content=@results['Get Notification Content -
                  Email']['Body'].gsub(/<DATASET>(.*?)<\/DATASET>/) do
                  @results['Dataset'][$1] end
                  content=content.gsub(/<ATTACHMENT>(.*?)<\/ATTACHMENT>/) do
                  "" end content=content.gsub(/<ANSWER>(.*?)<\/ANSWER>/) do
                  @results['Answers'][$1] end
                  content=content.gsub(/<BASE>(.*?)<\/BASE>/) do
                  @results['Base'][$1] end
                  content=content.gsub(/<MISC>(.*?)<\/MISC>/) do
                  @results['Misc. Inputs'][$1] end content %>

parameter.label: Alternate (text) Body
parameter.tooltip: A plaintext message that will be displayed if the recipient can't display multipart HTML emails.

parameters.parameter:
<%= content="" content=@results['Get Notification Content -
                  Email']['Body'].gsub(/<DATASET>(.*?)<\/DATASET>/) do
                  @results['Dataset'][$1] end
                  content=content.gsub(/<ATTACHMENT>(.*?)<\/ATTACHMENT>/) do
                  "" end content=content.gsub(/<ANSWER>(.*?)<\/ANSWER>/) do
                  @results['Answers'][$1] end
                  content=content.gsub(/<BASE>(.*?)<\/BASE>/) do
                  @results['Base'][$1] end
                  content=content.gsub(/<MISC>(.*?)<\/MISC>/) do
                  @results['Misc. Inputs'][$1] end content %>

parameter.label: From (email address)
parameter.tooltip: The email address of the simulated sender.

parameter.label: To (email address)
parameter.tooltip: The email address of the intended recipient.

parameter.label: Subject
parameter.tooltip: The subject of the email.

parameters.parameter:
<%= content="" content=@results['Get Notification Content - Login
                  ID']['Subject'].gsub(/<DATASET>(.*?)<\/DATASET>/) do
                  @results['Dataset'][$1] end content=content.gsub(/<PERSON
                  DETAILS>(.*?)<\/PERSON DETAILS>/) do @results['Retrieve
                  Person Details'][$1] end
                  content=content.gsub(/<ANSWER>(.*?)<\/ANSWER>/) do
                  @results['Answers'][$1] end
                  content=content.gsub(/<BASE>(.*?)<\/BASE>/) do
                  @results['Base'][$1] end
                  content=content.gsub(/<MISC>(.*?)<\/MISC>/) do
                  @results['Misc. Inputs'][$1] end content %>

parameter.label: HTML Body
parameter.tooltip: HTML representing the body of a rich email.

parameters.parameter:
<%= content="" content=@results['Get Notification Content - Login
                  ID']['Body'].gsub(/<DATASET>(.*?)<\/DATASET>/) do
                  @results['Dataset'][$1] end content=content.gsub(/<PERSON
                  DETAILS>(.*?)<\/PERSON DETAILS>/) do @results['Retrieve
                  Person Details'][$1] end
                  content=content.gsub(/<ANSWER>(.*?)<\/ANSWER>/) do
                  @results['Answers'][$1] end
                  content=content.gsub(/<BASE>(.*?)<\/BASE>/) do
                  @results['Base'][$1] end
                  content=content.gsub(/<MISC>(.*?)<\/MISC>/) do
                  @results['Misc. Inputs'][$1] end content %>

parameters.parameter:
<%= content="" content=@results['Get Notification Content - Login
                  ID']['Body'].gsub(/<DATASET>(.*?)<\/DATASET>/) do
                  @results['Dataset'][$1] end
                  content=content.gsub(/<ANSWER>(.*?)<\/ANSWER>/) do
                  @results['Answers'][$1] end
                  content=content.gsub(/<BASE>(.*?)<\/BASE>/) do
                  @results['Base'][$1] end
                  content=content.gsub(/<MISC>(.*?)<\/MISC>/) do

parameter.label: Content Type:
parameter.tooltip: The content type either plain text or base 64 encoded.

parameter.label: Attachment Question Menu Label:
parameter.tooltip: The menu label of an attachment question to retrieve an attachment from.

parameter.label: Request Instance ID:
parameter.tooltip: The instance ID of a request to retrieve an attachment from.

parameter.label: Template Instance ID:
parameter.tooltip: The instance ID of a template to retrieve an attachment from.

parameter.label: Message Name:
parameter.tooltip: The name of the message to be sent. This is used to lookup the appropriate content in the KS_SRV_Helper form

parameter.label: Region:
parameter.tooltip: The region (if available) of the person that the email is to be sent to

parameter.label: Language:
parameter.tooltip: The language (if available) that the message should be sent in

parameters.parameter: <%=attachmentName="" bodyText="" if @results['Get Base Notification']['Body'].includes?("<ATTACHMENT>") bodyText=@results['Get Base Notification']['Body'].split("<ATTACHMENT>") bodyText1=bodyText[1].split("</ATTACHMENT>") attachmentName=bodyText1[0] end subjectText="" if @results['Get Base Notification']['Subject'].includes?("<ATTACHMENT>") subjectText=@results['Get Base Notification']['Subject'].split("<ATTACHMENT>") subjectText1=subjectText[1].split("</ATTACHMENT>") attachmentName=subjectText1[0] end attachmentName %>

parameter.label: Catalog Name
parameter.tooltip: The catalog name of the service item this handler will query for the given attribute

parameter.label: Service Item Name
parameter.tooltip: The name of the service item this handler will query for the given attribute

parameter.label: Attribute Name
parameter.tooltip: The name of the attribute that this handler will query for

parameter.label: To
parameter.tooltip: A comma separated list of email address to be used as the intended recipients. Custom names can be used if any of the addresses are provided in the format: NAME <ADDRESS>

parameters.parameter: <%=if @results.has_key?('Collect Emails') @results['Collect Emails']['output'] else @results['Get Base Notification']['Recipient'] end%>

parameter.label: CC
parameter.tooltip: A comma separated list of email address to be used as the intended CC recipients. Custom names can be used if any of the addresses are provided in the format: NAME <ADDRESS>

parameter.label: BCC
parameter.tooltip: A comma separated list of email address to be used as the intended BCC recipients. Custom names can be used if any of the addresses are provided in the format: NAME <ADDRESS>

parameter.label: Display Name (From)
parameter.tooltip: The value to be used for the Name of the sender (the email address of the sender can not be manually set).

parameter.label: Reply To
parameter.tooltip: The address of the account that email replies should be sent to. The email address of the A custom name can be used if the address is provided in the format: NAME <ADDRESS>

parameter.label: Subject
parameter.tooltip: The subject of the email.

parameters.parameter: <%= content="" content=@results['Get Base Notification']['Subject'].gsub(/<DATASET>(.*?)<\/DATASET>/) do @results['Dataset'][$1] end content=content.gsub(/<APPCONFIG>(.*?)<\/APPCONFIG>/) do @results['App Config'][$1] end content=content.gsub(/<ATTACHMENT>(.*?)<\/ATTACHMENT>/) do "" end content=content.gsub(/<ANSWER>(.*?)<\/ANSWER>/) do @results['Answers'][$1] end content=content.gsub(/<BASE>(.*?)<\/BASE>/) do @results['Base'][$1] end content=content.gsub(/<MISC>(.*?)<\/MISC>/) do @results['Misc. Inputs'][$1] end content %>

parameter.label: HTML Body
parameter.tooltip: HTML representing the body of the email (should start with '<html>' and end with '</html>').

Inputs'][$1] end content %>

parameter.label: Alternate Body (Text)
parameter.tooltip: A plaintext message that will be displayed if the recipient can't display multipart HTML emails.

<%=if @results.has_key?('Collect Emails') @results['Collect

task.label: Attachment
task.value: @results['Get Notification Content - Login ID']['Body'].include?("<ATTACHMENT>") || @results['Get Notification Content - Login ID']['Subject'].include?("<ATTACHMENT>")

task.label: No Attach
task.value: !@results['Get Notification Content - Login ID']['Body'].include?("<ATTACHMENT>") && !@results['Get Notification Content - Login ID']['Subject'].include?("<ATTACHMENT>")

parameter.label: Remedy Login ID:
parameter.tooltip: The user login id used to lookup the appropriate language preference in the KS_SRV_Helper form
